page.title: 13Education
page.content: Education plays a very important part in the lives of the Linwood community. In all there are 5 Primary schools and 2 Secondary schools. We have chosen only two of these as examples;{St Brendan's Secondary}and {Mossedge Primary}. The Primary School caters for children aged between 5 and 12 years of age. The Secondary School caters for persons between 12 and 18. The Secondary sector is now being expanded to cater also for{adults}who have left school but wish to return to take{further education classes}in their own area. Some of these classes lead to certificates. The Secondary School caters for children from a Children's Home outwith the area. The schools are also available for use by the{community}. All the buildings are of recent construction, the oldest being 20 years old.
